name: Candy Chefs: Match 3
description:
Help the master Candy Chef in his crazy kitchen and match 3, 4, or more candies to crush them! It has many levels and different challenges to keep you entertained for hours. If you love puzzle or board game, you will enjoy our crafty candy game!

We all dream of going to a chocolate factory, patisserie, or a candy land where all the best sweets, desserts, cookie, or cake are made. That’s why there are so many candy, cake, or even soda themed games out there! This time we will journey into a crazy kitchen belonging to a skilled Candy Chef. Since this crazy kitchen is really a mess inside out, he needs our help to organize and clean it up! All you have to do is swap the candies to blast and crush them from the board to make place for the new candies. You have limited move to achieve your target for each level. That’s why you have to think of the best strategy to complete a level. To improve your score and blast more candies and jellies off the board, you can connect 4 or even 5 candies at once. You will get bonus sweets that will help you finish the board and achieve your objective faster. Fun, isn’t it? Why don’t you try it out to see if you prefer our game compared to other similar sagas out there?

o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o
BEST FEATURES OF CANDY CHEF IN CANDY LAND:
o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o
• A fun, addictive casual game for everyone.
• Simple game rule: swap a candy to create match 3 or more candies to blast them.
• Stunning handcrafted graphic with theme that everyone will love.
• Hundreds of hours of gaming with many levels to conquer.
• Journey through the candy land and smash more sugary sweet things on your way.
• Limited move & exciting challenge for every level.
• Get bonus and multipliers when you connect 4 or 5 jellies or sweets at once.
• Variety of candies and jellies.

We know that there are so many variety of sugar smash, cake swap, chocolate saga, soda match three, or blasting cookies off the board. However, we know that you will enjoy playing this candy crushing game. That’s because our match three saga game has all aspects that will ensure great game experience: awesome graphic and theme, smooth gameplay, and variety of challenges throughout the game. We encourage you to download and try Candy Chef to see for yourself.
Our game is also perfect for kids. It doesn’t require advanced match or English skill. They just need to swap the sweets to smash and crash them. The theme is also very colorful and appealing to young kids. This is a great game that will boost their cognitive skill as well as engage them in fun activity.
So, what are you waiting for? Start connecting candies and blast them to win!
